title: Implement user notification system
description: Build a comprehensive notification system that alerts users to important events, updates, and system changes through multiple channels including email and in-app notifications
iWant: timely notifications about important events and updates
soThat: I stay informed and can respond to critical changes within 5 minutes
acceptanceCriteria: Email notifications are sent within 2 minutes of triggering events
In-app notifications appear immediately when user is online
Users can configure notification preferences for different event types
Notification history is accessible for the past 30 days
